title: 'Immigration Crisis: Lives at Risk at our Southern Border' panel discussion in Boston
body:
'Immigration Crisis: Lives at Risk at our Southern Border' panel discussion in Boston. Panelists include Lawyers 
for Civil Rights Executive Director Ivan Espinoza-Madrigal, and Casa del Migrante Director Father Pat Murphy

Event Start Date: 2019-10-16

Event End Date: 2019-10-16

Event URL: http://www.faith-justice.org

Event time: 18:15 EDT
